product_name: Patagonia Capilene 1 Stretch Boxer Briefs - Men's
long_description: Compared to your average cotton briefs, the Patagonia Capilene(R) 1 Stretch Boxer Briefs are stretchy, soft and a no-brainer for aerobic activity. Lightweight, open-knit fabric invites airflow, wicks moisture and works well when layering. Gladiodor(R) natural odor control employs benign amino acids to help keep funky scents at bay; plus, it's nonpolluting, safe and durable. Brushed elastic waistband feels super soft against skin. You won't chafe in these briefs because the seams are low profile and offset. Functional fly. The Patagonia Lightweight Boxer Briefs are formfitting.
short_description: Compared to your average cotton briefs, the Patagonia Capilene(R) 1 Stretch Boxer Briefs are stretchy, soft and a no-brainer for aerobic activity.
